mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(CUSTOMER_CODE) FROM OISONE_CUSTOMER WHERE 1 = 1
AND ${searchKeyword} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue} ||'%'

SELECT CUSTOMER_CODE , CREATE_DATE , WRITER , TITLE , CONTENT , IS_READ , SECRET_NUMBER , IS_NOTICE , GROUP_CODE , ROWNUM FROM ( SELECT CUSTOMER_CODE , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE , WRITER , TITLE , CONTENT , IS_READ , SECRET_NUMBER , IS_NOTICE , GROUP_CODE FROM OISONE_CUSTOMER WHERE 1 = 1 AND IS_NOTICE = 'N' AND WRITER = #{nickName} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT CUS.CUSTOMER_CODE , WRITER , TITLE , CONTENT , SECRET_NUMBER , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE , IS_READ , GROUP_CODE , CUSTOMER_IMG_CODE , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME FROM OISONE_CUSTOMER CUS, OISONE_CUSTOMER_IMG IMG WHERE CUS.CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode} AND CUS.CUSTOMER_CODE = IMG.CUSTOMER_CODE

SELECT CUSTOMER_REPLY_CODE , WRITER , CONTENT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS CREATE_DATE , CUSTOMER_CODE FROM OISONE_CUSTOMER_REPLY WHERE CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode} ORDER BY CUSTOMER_REPLY_CODE DESC
